snippet: The warden and a guard at Sampson Correctional Institute were suspended after inmates reported that guards had forced them to rub hot sauce on their genitals, kiss deadly snakes and imitate sex acts.
abstract: Warden Lafayette Hall and guard David P Jones at Sampson Correctional Institute in Clinton, NC, are suspended after inmates reported being forced to rub hot sauce on their genitals, kiss deadly snakes and imitate sex acts.
lead_paragraph: The warden and a guard at Sampson Correctional Institute were suspended after inmates reported that guards had forced them to rub hot sauce on their genitals, kiss deadly snakes and imitate sex acts.

headline.seo: North Carolina: Warden and Guard Suspended
headline.main: North Carolina: Warden and Guard Suspended
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Warden and Guard Suspended
